alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dallas County through 545 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyler, or 8 miles southeast of Selmont-West Selmont, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selmont-West Selmont, Tyler, Selma Drag Strip and Craig Field Aiport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
